summary: No refactoring needed. Both components are well-structured and follow SOLID/KISS/DRY/YAGNI principles.

AutoYesConfirmDialog.tsx.notes: Single responsibility, clean props interface, proper accessibility via Modal component, no unused imports.

AutoYesToggle.tsx.notes: Proper use of memo, useCallback, aria-checked/aria-label attributes, clean separation of concerns with formatTimeRemaining helper, no code duplication.
